thread.title: Microsoft Pays $24,000 To Researcher For Preventing Dangerous Outlook Worm

title: Microsoft Pays $24,000 To Researcher For Preventing Dangerous Outlook Worm
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Technology - Today 
Webmail security sucks. But at least researchers can make big money by making a mockery of it, thanks to Microsoft's generous bug bounty pro...
